actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 107 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 5817) to provide that any site within a State selected by the Department of Energy for radioactive waste storage shall be subject to review and disapproval by the legislature of such State.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to provide that any site within a State selected by the Department of Energy for radioactive waste storage shall be subject to review and disapproval by the legislature or Governor of such State.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 107 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 5817) to provide that any site within a State selected by the Department of Energy for radioactive waste storage shall be subject to review and disapproval by the legislature of such State.
